::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell hash='import_cache/html/download_f82071ec30eac3b3357b3c83533cbc16'}

```{.r .cell-code}
URL <- "https://github.com/owid/co2-data/archive/refs/heads/master.zip"

base_path <- path("data", "raw")

fname <- paste(today(), 
               "owid-co2-codebook.zip",
               sep = "_")

fpath <- path(base_path,
              fname)
download.file(url = URL,
              destfile = fpath)
```
:::


V1: Le fichier a été téléchargé là:

data/raw/2022-12-18_owid-co2-codebook.zip.

V2: V1: Le fichier a été téléchargé là:data/raw/2022-12-18_owid-co2-codebook.zip


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
unzip(zipfile = fpath,
      exdir = base_path)
```
:::


Nous voyons qu'il y a deux nouveaux fichiers: data/raw/2022-12-18_owid-co2-codebook.zip, data/raw/co2-data-master


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- read.csv(file = path(base_path, "co2-data-master/owid-co2-codebook.csv"))

skim(df)
```
